parameters.name: ActionOnMaintenance
parameters.description:
The maintenance action. Valid values:

*   Stop: stops the instance.
*   AutoRecover: automatically recovers the instance.
*   AutoRedeploy: redeploys the instance, which may damage the data disks attached to the instance.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of instance N. Valid values of N: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: NotifyOnMaintenance
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to send an event notification before maintenance. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Default value: false.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
